pokemon.name: victini
pokemon.dex: It creates an unlimited supply of energy inside its body, which it shares with those who touch it.

pokemon.name: snivy
pokemon.dex: It is very intelligent and calm. Being exposed to lots of sunlight makes its movements swifter.

pokemon.name: servine
pokemon.dex: When it gets dirty, its leaves can't be used in photosynthesis, so it always keeps itself clean.

pokemon.name: serperior
pokemon.dex: It can stop its opponents' movements with just a glare. It takes in solar energy and boosts it internally.

pokemon.name: tepig
pokemon.dex: It blows fire through its nose. When it catches a cold, the fire becomes pitch-black smoke instead.

pokemon.name: pignite
pokemon.dex: When its internal fire flares up, its movements grow sharper and faster. When in trouble, it emits smoke.

pokemon.name: emboar
pokemon.dex: A flaring beard of fire is proof that it is fired up. It is adept at using many different moves.

pokemon.name: oshawott
pokemon.dex: It fights using the scalchop on its stomach. In response to an attack, it retaliates immediately by slashing.

pokemon.name: dewott
pokemon.dex: Strict training is how it learns its flowing double-scalchop technique.

pokemon.name: samurott
pokemon.dex: In the time it takes a foe to blink, it can draw and sheathe the seamitars attached to its front legs.

pokemon.name: patrat
pokemon.dex: Extremely cautious, one of them will always be on the lookout, but it won't notice a foe coming from behind.

pokemon.name: watchog
pokemon.dex: Using luminescent matter, it makes its eyes and body glow and stuns attacking opponents.

pokemon.name: lillipup
pokemon.dex: Though it is a very brave Pokémon, it's also smart enough to check its foe's strength and avoid battle.

pokemon.name: herdier
pokemon.dex: It loyally follows its Trainer's orders. For ages, they have helped Trainers raise Pokémon.

pokemon.name: stoutland
pokemon.dex: This extremely wise Pokémon excels at rescuing people stranded at sea or in the mountains.

pokemon.name: purrloin
pokemon.dex: Their cute act is a ruse. They trick people and steal their valuables just to see the looks on their faces.

pokemon.name: liepard
pokemon.dex: Their beautiful form comes from the muscles they have developed. They run silently in the night.

pokemon.name: pansage
pokemon.dex: It shares the leaf on its head with weary-looking Pokémon. These leaves are known to relieve stress.

pokemon.name: simisage
pokemon.dex: It attacks enemies with strikes of its thorn-covered tail. This Pokémon is wild tempered.

pokemon.name: pansear
pokemon.dex: This Pokémon lives in caves in volcanoes. The fire within the tuft on its head can reach 600° F.

pokemon.name: simisear
pokemon.dex: It loves sweets because they become energy for the fire burning inside its body.

pokemon.name: panpour
pokemon.dex: The water stored inside the tuft on its head is full of nutrients. Plants that receive its water grow large.

pokemon.name: simipour
pokemon.dex: The high-pressure water expelled from its tail is so powerful, it can destroy a concrete wall.

pokemon.name: munna
pokemon.dex: This Pokémon appears before people and Pokémon who are having nightmares and eats those dreams.

pokemon.name: musharna
pokemon.dex: With the mist from its forehead, it can create shapes of things from dreams it has eaten.

pokemon.name: pidove
pokemon.dex: Each follows its Trainer's orders as best it can, but they sometimes fail to understand complicated commands.

pokemon.name: tranquill
pokemon.dex: It can return to its Trainer's location regardless of the distance separating them.

pokemon.name: unfezant
pokemon.dex: Males swing the plumage on their heads to threaten others, but females are better at flying.

pokemon.name: blitzle
pokemon.dex: When thunderclouds cover the sky, it will appear. It can catch lightning with its mane and store the electricity.

pokemon.name: zebstrika
pokemon.dex: When this ill-tempered Pokémon runs wild, it shoots lightning from its mane in all directions.

pokemon.name: roggenrola
pokemon.dex: Its ear is hexagonal in shape. Compressed underground, its body is as hard as steel.

pokemon.name: boldore
pokemon.dex: Because its energy was too great to be contained, the energy leaked and formed orange crystals.

pokemon.name: gigalith
pokemon.dex: The solar rays it absorbs are processed in its energy core and fired as a ball of light.

pokemon.name: woobat
pokemon.dex: Its habitat is dark forests and caves. It emits ultrasonic waves from its nose to learn about its surroundings.

pokemon.name: swoobat
pokemon.dex: It emits sound waves of various frequencies from its nose, including some powerful enough to destroy rocks.

pokemon.name: drilbur
pokemon.dex: By spinning its body, it can dig straight through the ground at a speed of 30 mph.

pokemon.name: excadrill
pokemon.dex: It can help in tunnel construction. Its drill has evolved into steel strong enough to bore through iron plates.

pokemon.name: audino
pokemon.dex: It touches others with the feelers on its ears, using the sound of their heartbeats to tell how they are feeling.

pokemon.name: timburr
pokemon.dex: Always carrying squared logs, they help out with construction. As they grow, they carry bigger logs.

pokemon.name: gurdurr
pokemon.dex: This Pokémon is so muscular and strongly built that even a group of wrestlers could not make it budge an inch.

pokemon.name: conkeldurr
pokemon.dex: Rather than rely on force, they master moves that utilize the centrifugal force of spinning concrete.

pokemon.name: tympole
pokemon.dex: They warn others of danger by vibrating their cheeks to create a high-pitched sound.

pokemon.name: palpitoad
pokemon.dex: It lives in the water and on land. It uses its long, sticky tongue to capture prey.

pokemon.name: seismitoad
pokemon.dex: They shoot paralyzing liquid from their head bumps. They use vibration to hurt their opponents.

pokemon.name: throh
pokemon.dex: When they encounter foes bigger than themselves, they try to throw them. They always travel in packs of five.

pokemon.name: sawk
pokemon.dex: Desiring the strongest karate chop, they seclude themselves in mountains and train without sleeping.

pokemon.name: sewaddle
pokemon.dex: Since this Pokémon makes its own clothes out of leaves, it is a popular mascot for fashion designers.

pokemon.name: swadloon
pokemon.dex: It protects itself from the cold by wrapping up in leaves. It stays on the move, eating leaves in forests.

pokemon.name: leavanny
pokemon.dex: Upon finding a small Pokémon, it weaves clothing for it from leaves by using the sticky silk secreted from its mouth.

pokemon.name: venipede
pokemon.dex: Its bite injects a potent poison, enough to paralyze large bird Pokémon that try to prey on it.

pokemon.name: whirlipede
pokemon.dex: Protected by a hard shell, it spins its body like a wheel and crashes furiously into its enemies.

pokemon.name: scolipede
pokemon.dex: With quick movements, it chases down its foes, attacking relentlessly with its horns until it prevails.

pokemon.name: cottonee
pokemon.dex: They go wherever the wind takes them. On rainy days, their bodies are heavier, so they take shelter beneath big trees.

pokemon.name: whimsicott
pokemon.dex: Like the wind, it can slip through any gap, no matter how small. It leaves balls of white fluff behind.

pokemon.name: petilil
pokemon.dex: The leaves on its head are very bitter. Eating one of these leaves is known to refresh a tired body.

pokemon.name: lilligant
pokemon.dex: The fragrance of the garland on its head has a relaxing effect, but taking care of it is very difficult.

pokemon.name: basculin
pokemon.dex: Red and blue ________ get along so poorly, they'll start fighting instantly. These Pokémon are very hostile.

pokemon.name: sandile
pokemon.dex: They live hidden under hot desert sands in order to keep their body temperature from dropping.

pokemon.name: krokorok
pokemon.dex: They live in groups of a few individuals. Protective membranes shield their eyes from sandstorms.

pokemon.name: krookodile
pokemon.dex: Very violent Pokémon, they try to clamp down on anything that moves in front of their eyes.

pokemon.name: darumaka
pokemon.dex: When it sleeps, it pulls its limbs into its body and its internal fire goes down to 1,100° F.

pokemon.name: darmanitan
pokemon.dex: Its internal fire burns at 2,500° F, making enough power that it can destroy a dump truck with one punch.

pokemon.name: maractus
pokemon.dex: It uses an up-tempo song and dance to drive away the bird Pokémon that prey on its flower seeds.

pokemon.name: dwebble
pokemon.dex: This Pokémon can easily melt holes in hard rocks with a liquid secreted from its mouth.

pokemon.name: crustle
pokemon.dex: When its boulder is broken in battles for territory, it feels unsure and begins to weaken.

pokemon.name: scraggy
pokemon.dex: It immediately headbutts anyone that makes eye contact with it. Its skull is massively thick.

pokemon.name: scrafty
pokemon.dex: Groups of them beat up anything that enters their territory. Each can spit acidic liquid from its mouth.

pokemon.name: sigilyph
pokemon.dex: The guardians of an ancient city, they use their psychic power to attack enemies that invade their territory.

pokemon.name: yamask
pokemon.dex: Each of them carries a mask that used to be its face when it was human. Sometimes they look at it and cry.

pokemon.name: cofagrigus
pokemon.dex: Grave robbers who mistake them for real coffins and get too close end up trapped inside their bodies.

pokemon.name: tirtouga
pokemon.dex: Restored from a fossil, this Pokémon can dive to depths beyond half a mile.

pokemon.name: carracosta
pokemon.dex: Incredible jaw strength enables them to chew up steel beams and rocks along with their prey.

pokemon.name: archen
pokemon.dex: Revived from a fossil, this Pokémon is thought to be the ancestor of all bird Pokémon.

pokemon.name: archeops
pokemon.dex: It runs better than it flies. It catches prey by running at speeds comparable to those of an automobile.

pokemon.name: trubbish
pokemon.dex: Inhaling the gas they belch will make you sleep for a week. They prefer unsanitary places.

pokemon.name: garbodor
pokemon.dex: It clenches opponents with its left arm and finishes them off with foul-smelling poison gas belched from its mouth.

pokemon.name: zorua
pokemon.dex: It changes so it looks just like its foe, tricks it, and then uses that opportunity to flee.

pokemon.name: zoroark
pokemon.dex: Bonds between these Pokémon are very strong. It protects the safety of its pack by tricking its opponents.

pokemon.name: minccino
pokemon.dex: They greet one another by rubbing each other with their tails, which are always kept well groomed and clean.

pokemon.name: cinccino
pokemon.dex: Their white fur is coated in a special oil that makes it easy for them to deflect attacks.

pokemon.name: gothita
pokemon.dex: Their ribbonlike feelers increase their psychic power. They are always staring at something.

pokemon.name: gothorita
pokemon.dex: Starlight is the source of their power. At night, they mark star positions by using psychic power to float stones.

pokemon.name: gothitelle
pokemon.dex: Starry skies thousands of light-years away are visible in the space distorted by their intense psychic power.

pokemon.name: solosis
pokemon.dex: They drive away attackers by unleashing psychic power. They can use telepathy to talk with others.

pokemon.name: duosion
pokemon.dex: Since they have two divided brains, at times they suddenly try to take two different actions at once.

pokemon.name: reuniclus
pokemon.dex: These remarkably intelligent Pokémon fight by controlling arms that can grip with rock-crushing power.

pokemon.name: ducklett
pokemon.dex: When attacked, it uses its feathers to splash water, escaping under cover of the spray.

pokemon.name: swanna
pokemon.dex: Despite their elegant appearance, they can flap their wings strongly and fly for thousands of miles.

pokemon.name: vanillite
pokemon.dex: This Pokémon formed from icicles bathed in energy from the morning sun. It sleeps buried in snow.

pokemon.name: vanillish
pokemon.dex: It conceals itself from enemy eyes by creating many small ice particles and hiding among them.

pokemon.name: vanilluxe
pokemon.dex: Swallowing large amounts of water, they make snow clouds inside their bodies and attack their foes with violent blizzards.

pokemon.name: deerling
pokemon.dex: The color and scent of their fur changes to match the mountain grass. When they sense hostility, they hide in the grass.

pokemon.name: sawsbuck
pokemon.dex: The plants growing on its horns change according to the season. The leaders of the herd possess magnificent horns.

pokemon.name: emolga
pokemon.dex: They live on treetops and glide using the inside of a cape-like membrane while discharging electricity.

pokemon.name: karrablast
pokemon.dex: When they feel threatened, they spit an acidic liquid to drive attackers away. This Pokémon targets Shelmet.

pokemon.name: escavalier
pokemon.dex: They fly around at high speed, striking with their pointed spears. Even when in trouble, they face opponents bravely.

pokemon.name: foongus
pokemon.dex: It lures Pokémon with its pattern that looks just like a Poké Ball then releases poison spores.

pokemon.name: amoonguss
pokemon.dex: It moves the caps on both arms and does a dance to lure prey. It prefers damp places.

pokemon.name: frillish
pokemon.dex: With its thin, veil-like arms wrapped around the body of its opponent, it sinks to the ocean floor.

pokemon.name: jellicent
pokemon.dex: They propel themselves by expelling absorbed seawater from their bodies. Their favorite food is life energy.

pokemon.name: alomomola
pokemon.dex: It gently holds injured and weak Pokémon in its fins. Its special membrane heals their wounds.

pokemon.name: joltik
pokemon.dex: Since it can't generate its own electricity, it sticks onto large-bodied Pokémon and absorbs static electricity.

pokemon.name: galvantula
pokemon.dex: It creates barriers from electrified silk that stun foes. This works as a weapon as well as a defense.

pokemon.name: ferroseed
pokemon.dex: They stick their spikes into cave walls and absorb the minerals they find in the rock.

pokemon.name: ferrothorn
pokemon.dex: They attach themselves to cave ceilings, firing steel spikes at targets passing beneath them.

pokemon.name: klink
pokemon.dex: Interlocking two bodies and spinning around generates the energy they need to live.

pokemon.name: klang
pokemon.dex: By changing the direction in which it rotates, it communicates its feelings to others. When angry, it rotates faster.

pokemon.name: klinklang
pokemon.dex: Its red core functions as an energy tank. It fires the charged energy through its spikes into an area.

pokemon.name: tynamo
pokemon.dex: These Pokémon move in schools. They have an electricity-generating organ, so they discharge electricity if in danger.

pokemon.name: eelektrik
pokemon.dex: These Pokémon have a big appetite. When they spot their prey, they attack it and paralyze it with electricity.

pokemon.name: eelektross
pokemon.dex: They crawl out of the ocean using their arms. They will attack prey on shore and immediately drag it into the ocean.

pokemon.name: elgyem
pokemon.dex: It uses its strong psychic power to squeeze its opponent's brain, causing unendurable headaches.

pokemon.name: beheeyem
pokemon.dex: It uses psychic power to control an opponent's brain and tamper with its memories.

pokemon.name: litwick
pokemon.dex: While shining a light and pretending to be a guide, it leeches off the life force of any who follow it.

pokemon.name: lampent
pokemon.dex: This ominous Pokémon is feared. Through cities it wanders, searching for the spirits of the fallen.

pokemon.name: chandelure
pokemon.dex: The spirits burned up in its ominous flame lose their way and wander this world forever.

pokemon.name: axew
pokemon.dex: They use their tusks to crush the berries they eat. Repeated regrowth makes their tusks strong and sharp.

pokemon.name: fraxure
pokemon.dex: A broken tusk will not grow back, so it diligently sharpens its tusks on river rocks after the end of a battle.

pokemon.name: haxorus
pokemon.dex: Its tusks are incredibly destructive. They can easily slice through a thick, sturdy steel column every time.

pokemon.name: cubchoo
pokemon.dex: Its nose is always running. It sniffs the snot back up because the mucus provides the raw material for its moves.

pokemon.name: beartic
pokemon.dex: It can make its breath freeze at will. Very able in the water, it swims around in northern seas and catches prey.

pokemon.name: cryogonal
pokemon.dex: They are born in snow clouds. They use chains made of ice crystals to capture prey.

pokemon.name: shelmet
pokemon.dex: When attacked, it defends itself by closing the lid of its shell. It can spit a sticky, poisonous liquid.

pokemon.name: accelgor
pokemon.dex: Having removed its heavy shell, it becomes very light and can fight with ninja-like movements.

pokemon.name: stunfisk
pokemon.dex: When its opponent can't be paralyzed, it contorts itself with unexpected speed and flops away.

pokemon.name: mienfoo
pokemon.dex: It takes pride in the speed at which it can use moves. What it loses in power, it makes up for in quantity.

pokemon.name: mienshao
pokemon.dex: They use the long fur on their arms as a whip to strike their opponents.

pokemon.name: druddigon
pokemon.dex: It warms its body by absorbing sunlight with its wings. When its body temperature falls, it can no longer move.

pokemon.name: golett
pokemon.dex: The energy that burns inside it enables it to move, but no one has yet been able to identify this energy.

pokemon.name: golurk
pokemon.dex: It flies across the sky at Mach speeds. Removing the seal on its chest makes its internal energy go out of control.

pokemon.name: pawniard
pokemon.dex: Ignoring their injuries, groups attack by sinking the blades that cover their bodies into their prey.

pokemon.name: bisharp
pokemon.dex: It leads a group of Pawniard. It battles to become the boss, but will be driven from the group if it loses.

pokemon.name: bouffalant
pokemon.dex: Their fluffy fur absorbs damage, even if they strike foes with a fierce headbutt.

pokemon.name: rufflet
pokemon.dex: They will challenge anything, even strong opponents, without fear. Their frequent fights help them become stronger.

pokemon.name: braviary
pokemon.dex: The more scars they have, the more respect these brave soldiers of the sky get from their peers.

pokemon.name: vullaby
pokemon.dex: They tend to guard their posteriors with suitable bones they have found. They pursue weak Pokémon.

pokemon.name: mandibuzz
pokemon.dex: It makes a nest out of bones it finds. It grabs weakened prey in its talons and hauls it to its nest of bones.

pokemon.name: heatmor
pokemon.dex: It breathes through a hole in its tail while it burns with an internal fire. Durant is its prey.

pokemon.name: durant
pokemon.dex: They attack in groups, covering themselves in steel armor to protect themselves from Heatmor.

pokemon.name: deino
pokemon.dex: It tends to bite everything, and it is not a picky eater. Approaching it carelessly is dangerous.

pokemon.name: zweilous
pokemon.dex: After it has eaten up all the food in its territory, it moves to another area. Its two heads do not get along.

pokemon.name: hydreigon
pokemon.dex: This brutal Pokémon travels the skies on its six wings. Anything that moves seems like a foe to it, triggering its attack.

pokemon.name: larvesta
pokemon.dex: This Pokémon was believed to have been born from the sun. When it evolves, its entire body is engulfed in flames.

pokemon.name: volcarona
pokemon.dex: A sea of fire engulfs the surroundings of their battles, since they use their six wings to scatter their ember scales.

pokemon.name: cobalion
pokemon.dex: It has a body and heart of steel. Its glare is sufficient to make even an unruly Pokémon obey it.

pokemon.name: terrakion
pokemon.dex: This Pokémon came to the defense of Pokémon that had lost their homes in a war among humans.

pokemon.name: virizion
pokemon.dex: Its head sprouts horns as sharp as blades. Using whirlwind-like movements, it confounds and swiftly cuts opponents.

pokemon.name: tornadus
pokemon.dex: In every direction it flies, creating winds so powerful, they blow everything away.

pokemon.name: thundurus
pokemon.dex: As it flies around, it shoots lightning all over the place and causes forest fires. It is therefore disliked.

pokemon.name: reshiram
pokemon.dex: This Pokémon appears in legends. It sends flames into the air from its tail, burning up everything around it.

pokemon.name: zekrom
pokemon.dex: Concealing itself in lightning clouds, it flies throughout the Unova region. It creates electricity in its tail.

pokemon.name: landorus
pokemon.dex: The energy that comes pouring from its tail increases the nutrition in the soil, making crops grow to great size.

pokemon.name: kyurem
pokemon.dex: It generates a powerful, freezing energy inside itself, but its body became frozen when the energy leaked out.

pokemon.name: keldeo
pokemon.dex: It crosses the world, running over the surfaces of oceans and rivers. It appears at scenic waterfronts.

pokemon.name: meloetta
pokemon.dex: Its melodies are sung with a special vocalization method that can control the feelings of those who hear it.

pokemon.name: genesect
pokemon.dex: Over 300 million years ago, it was feared as the strongest of hunters. It has been modified by Team Plasma.
